Caio Fortes

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/4267836368129425
  • Última atualização do currículo em 17/09/2019

B.S in Agronomic Engineering (Universidade Federal de Sao Carlos, 2001) MSc in Soil and Plant Nutrition (ESALQ - Universidade de Sao Paulo, 2004) Specialist in Projects & Engineering (The George Washington University - School of Business, 2009) PhD in Sciences (CENA - Universidade de Sao Paulo, 2010) Specialist in Business Management and Strategy (Universidade Estadual de Campinas - UNICAMP, 2020 - underway) Professional Background / Expertise: - Large experience in sugarcane (Saccharum sp.) and bioenergy value chains; - Practiced in row crops general farming - soybeans, corn, wheat, sorghum and other winter cereals under no-tillage system; - Specialist in agroindustrial assets evaluation (due diligence) for mergers and acquisitions and managing projects for yield improvement, losses prevention, cost reduction, safety and risk management; - Specific knowledge in Precision Agriculture (GIS, GPS, remote sensing) and Soil Sciences (tillage, fertilizers, carbon and nitrogen balances). - Proven leadership track record in different areas and companies: R&D: BASF SA; Copersucar Technology Center (CTC); Operations: São Martinho SA; Business Development and Projects: BP Biofuels (British Petroleum) (Texto informado pelo autor)

Outras informações
? Reporting to the Technical Director and Advanced Biofuels Business Vice President - VP; ? Lignocellulosic (LC) 2nd generation ethanol technology lead in Brazil and for implementing the celullosic conversion technology in Brazilian mills; ? Accountable for the devlopment of feedstock supply and biomass sourcing strategy; ? Business development of sugarcane straw baling services vendors and biomass industrial shredders; ? Industrial processes improvement, energy & mass / steam & heat balances optimization; ? Led business development for biomass feedstock handling: wood chips, sugarcane bagasse & straw (trash); ? Business advisory on industrial equipment engineering, design and procurement: lignin drying system (press filters, centrifuges), straw dry cleaning systems (air separators), trash baling and logistics.

Outros Projetos
2013 - Atual
Clean seed-cane & nursery farm
Descrição: ? Clean (disease free) seed-cane for BP operated mills ? New sugarcane varieties introduction - risk mitigation due to high varietal concentration ? Field trials capability building and provision of results for decision-making.
Situação: Em andamento; Natureza: Outra.

Integrantes: Caio Fortes - Coordenador.
2012 - 2014
Corporate GIS - Geographic Information System
Descrição: ? Geographic Information System for land management and other resources mapping for BP Biofuels Brazil ? Deployment of web-based tool integrated with the agroindustrial ERP ? GIS capability building: ArcGIS desktop users training ? Multi-disciplinary and multi-stakeholder project: more than 60 directly involved people.
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Outra.

Integrantes: Caio Fortes - Coordenador.
2011 - 2012
Vehicle Tracking System
Descrição: To address incident risks in transportation, I participated in this project within BP.
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Outra.

Integrantes: Caio Fortes - Coordenador / Wesley B. Ambrosio - Integrante / alexandre L. pereira - Integrante.
2010 - 2012
Sweet sorghum for bioenergy production
Descrição: ? Sweet sorghum ("sorgo sacarino") is an alternative feedstock for bioenergy (ethanol and energy) production and as a season extender ? Project team 40+ people and more than 1500 indirectly involved employees ? Commercial areas and field trials conducted from 2010 to 2012 to test agroindustrial performance and to co-develop agronomic packages with seed vendors (planting, herbicides, crop care).
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Outra.

Integrantes: Caio Fortes - Coordenador.
